title: THE iDOLM@STER Cinderella Girls: Starlight Stage - Shinshun! Happy New Year Campaign
original_name: アイドルマスター シンデレラガールズ スターライトステージ 新春！ハッピーニューイヤーキャンペーン
sinopse: A televised New Years commercial promoting the THE iDOLM@STER: Cinderella Girls - Starlight Stage (iOS/Android game) campaign starting the following day where you can receive 10 consecutive gifts in the gacha draw. The commercial opens with the girls listing off the best things to do for New Years.
